TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RelatedImageListAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class RelatedImageListAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class RelatedImageListAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: Indicates which a property is related to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](/dotnet/standard/attributes/).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string relatedImageList) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.param: The name of the the property relates to.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `relatedImageList` parameter can refer to a property of the current object, or a property of a property of the current object. For example, if you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> object with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListView%2A> property set to a containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> object, and the containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> object has an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> property, you could pass `"ListView.SmallImageList"` as the `relatedImageList` value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RelatedImageList As String
public: property System::String ^ RelatedImageList { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the related

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RelatedImageListAttribute.RelatedImageList%2A> property can refer to a property of the current object, or a property of a property of the current object. For example, if you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> object with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListView%2A> property set to a containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> object, and the containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> object has an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RelatedImageListAttribute.RelatedImageList%2A> property would be set to `"ListView.SmallImageList"`.
